message.body: I thought about you and your bday seriously 20 times this week/weekend! And then I miss telling you happy birthday on your actual birthday. Ahhhhhhh. Well I hope you had an amazing day of sleep. We will celebrate next time I see you! I have lots of love for you and miss you!!!!
i did! i drafted a reply this morning and went back to sleep before i could send it. :) thank you for my birthday wishes! timeliness isn't an issue, haha. i love/miss you toooooo!
